resources.string:
Magnetometer data Collection and Analysis.

 Transforms magnetometer file data to Excel spreadsheet 'MagnetolyzePT/copy.xls'. Edit template spreadsheet 'MagnetolyzePT/input.xls'; columns 1-5 will be over-written by data.

 	Analyze: Kingsoft Office 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cn.wps.moffice_eng

 	Collect: Physics Toolbox Magnetometer
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chrystianvieyra.android.physicstoolboxmagnetometer
 _________________________________
